page.title: 08POLICE - LAW AND ORDER
page.content:
NEWARK POLICE STATION
Newark {Police}Station is situated on the corner of Magnus Street and Appletongate. The {station}covers a wide radius, as far out as places such as Southwell. 73 people are employed at the station including clerical workers. The station building is attached to the court rooms. There are a number of cell rooms to keep people who are detained by the courts. Modern {technology}is evident at the station in the form of computers, Lion Intoxemeter 3000 Breathaliser machine and teleprinters There are many offices including an enquiry and detective office and a finger print room. Schools have a Community Police Officer attached to them. P.C. Quibell is Coddington's C.P.O.
